title: Sardines extra light
content:
Sardines, an original fat monospaced and square typeface. After being used for private and exclusive purposes only, Sardines has now a full characterset (ASE) and will soon be made available on **[Vette Letters](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012143646/http:/www.vetteletters.nl/)**

<cite>'… an amusing parade of heavyweight characters crammed into squares.'</cite>  
(Jan Middendorp, Dutch Type, 2004)

Used as title face in the first restyled issue (2004) of the dutch design magazine <cite>Items.</cite>

// Jacques

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012143646im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sardines_6539.png)
author: fonthausen
